title: [RODEN] The Morioka Experience
content:
Morioka. Holy smokes. This last month has been unexpected, exciting, sometimes exhausting, but mostly — uplifting and inspiring.
I have a new New York Times piece out about what’s been going on, but let me give you all — you Roden readers, me Craig Mod — a more detailed background story. (I’ve also just published, in tandem, a photo-heavy Ridgeline issue focusing on the people of Morioka.)
The new piece begins:
